full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL RDO RJE NAG PO CHEN PO GUR GYI MGON PO'I THUN MONG MA YIN PA'I BSRUNG 'KHOR RDO RJE BRAG RDZONG MA'I RJES GNANG GI BLA BRGYUD GSOL 'DEBS PHYI NANG GSANG BA'I LAM GYI RIM PA'I SMON LAM DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,

dates_of_the_author_(зохиогдсон_өдөр): SA PHO SPREL LO'I NAG PO ZLA BA'I DKAR PO'I TSES BRGYAD KYIN NYIN,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (CES DPAL RDO RJE NAG PO CHEN PO GUR GYI MGON PO'I THUN MONG MA YIN PA'I BSRUNG 'KHOR RDO RJE BRAG RDZONG MA'I RJES GNANG GI BLA BRGYUD GSOL @005A *, ,'DEBS PHYI NANG GSANG BA'I LAM GYI RIM PA'I SMON LAM DANG BCAS PA 'DI NI, GUR GYI MGON PO 'DI NYID LA MI PHYED PA'I DAD PA DANG RNAM DPYOD SHIN TU YANGS PA'I ROL DPON DBU MDZAD BLO BZANG TSE RING GIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, BRGYUD 'DEBS RANG GI THOB RGYUN LTAR DANG, SMON LAM RJE BTZUN RDO RING PA CHEN PO'I DNGOS SLOB BYA BRAL BA ZHIG GIS MDZAD PA SOR BZHAG TE, SHR'I BADZRA NA TH'I MING CAN GYIS SA PHO SPREL LO'I NAG PO ZLA BA'I DKAR PO'I TSES BRGYAD KYI NYIN LHUN GRUB BDE CHEN RIN CHEN JO BO'I GLING DU SBYAR BA'I KARMA N'A THAS BGYIS PA'O,, ,,)
